full_summary:
### 2 Forklifts: Request for Proposals
#### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3599552601
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3599552601
* **Publication Date**: December 23, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 20, 2023, at 14:00 EDT; all bids must be submitted before this deadline
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: January 15, 2024
* **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Tender Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Deliverables

The department is seeking two (2) Forklifts, ancillary items, integrated logistic support items including training, for delivery to Ontario and Saskatoon.

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage; Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity**: Department of Industry (ISED)
* **Address**: 235 Queen Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0H5, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Wilson-Bahun, Nalida (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: nalida.wilson-bahun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14962471?extsite=MTQ5NjI0NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14962471?extsite=MTQ5NjI0NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the deadline. Failure to adhere to this deadline will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time.  This notice constitutes the sole solicitation for this procurement; no separate notice will
